name: Middle Node.js developer
description:
Middle Node.js developer for US company

Faros AI is an operational data platform that brings all engineering data in one place to give engineering leaders a single-pane view of their entire software development lifecycle.   

We are looking for a Middle Node.js developer, who will be responsible for quality, testing and code review. The project is a data aggregator from many different sources, mainly everything related to IT, for example, github, gitlab, jira, etc. Each source needs its own connector - an independent service that integrates with the source API.

The challenge is to write these connectors quickly and efficiently.
Each connector is a separate project in node.js + typescript
The tests are on jest, the code is on github.

Requirements:
- Typescript;
- Node.js;
- GraphQL schema;
- Git;

Any node.js test framework.
It is a full time position.

After the first step of the interview process you need to complete a task in order to check your Node.js knowledge.

 Working Conditions
- Working schedule: Monday to Friday with flexible working hours.
- Monthly payments (banking transfer/PayPal/Payoneer/etc);
- Holidays and days off can be discussed;
- English-speaking environment.

 NOTE. It is a fully remote position, based on a contract employment.
